brand.name: ABS Immo Services
brand.description: Cabinet bu jëfandikoo ndimbal ngir taxawal, aar ak yokk valeur bu biens immobiliers yu am solo bu mag.

positioning.title: Sunuy jëfandikoo
positioning.text: Duñu dox ni agence bu kawaida. Benn liggéey bu nekk, ñu koy jëfandikoo ni mandat bu ndimbal, ak sutura ak gis-gis bu yagg.

bottom.rights: Yépp ay droit ñu aar leen

hero.title: Immobilier bu rafet ngir say jëfandikoo
hero.subtitle: ABS Immo Services di toppatoo nit ñi ak investisseur yi ci seen projets immobilier ci Sénégal.

positioning.title: Vision bu am solo ak jëm kanam
positioning.p1: Nu di tànn kër yi am solo ci gox yi gën a rafet.
positioning.p2: Sunuy liggéey mooy transparence ak toppatoo bu baax.
positioning.p3: Projet bu nekk nu koy def ak kersa ak yërmandé.

v1.title: Excellence
v1.text: Liggey bu am solo ci jëf bu nekk.

v2.title: Sécurité
v2.text: Wér gi ak kàddu gu leer.

v4.title: Nit ak Nit
v4.text: Toppatoo bu jëm ci nit ak yërmandé.

cta.title: Nanu wax ci sa projet
cta.text: Sunuy ekip am nañu waxtaan ak yaw.
cta.signature: ABS IMMO SERVICES — KÓLLËRÉ AK EXCELLENCE

hero.description: Sunuy xam-xam ak sunu sutura dinañu la dimbali ngir sa vision am njariñ.

form.name: Tur ak sant
form.security: Sa données dañu leen aar te sutura la.

hero.title2: bu ñu sàkkal ni actif financier
hero.description: ABS Immo Services di ànd ak investeer, family office ak entreprise yi ci structuration ak aar immobilier ci Sénégal.

analysis.title: Xam-xam patrimonial
analysis.text: Jàngat bu leer ci opération bu ne.

cta.title: Jokkoo bu sutura
cta.text: Sunuy waxtaan yi dañuy sutura. Laaj bu ne conseiller bu mag la koy saytu.

hero.label: Portfolio bu privé
hero.description: Tànneef bu metti bu ay biens immobiliers yu ñu analizé, yu ñu aar te yu méngoo ak la soxla investisseur yu privé ak institutionnel yi ci Sénégal.

empty.title: Amul benn jëfandikoo bu méngoo ak seeni critères.

propertyDetail.whatsappMessage: Salaam, maa ngi bëgg xam lu gën ci bien bi "{{title}}" ({{price}}M FCFA)
